positions.title: Full-stack Python and Javascript Developer
positions.description: Development contracting services for various projects and features.

positions.title: Fullstack Python and Javascript Developer
positions.description:
SAM (through Machinalis)
August 2017 – March 2018: Fullstack Python Developer
Python 3, Django REST Framework, Postgresql, Celery, Elasticsearch, Docker, Jira, Github.

A project from Red Hat for the argentinean migrations agency that ingest huge amounts of data from different databases with different structures and merges them into a single model easily consumable by users that need to extract information / patterns / connections / events from that data.
• Improved Elasticsearch indexing time by paralelizing the process with celery tasks, removing unnecessary queries and db indexes.
• Refactored the “saved searches” feature to skip the postgres database and run a ES query instead, improving response time and reducing the amount of code.
• Designed the “similarity search” feature to identify db rows that could be accidental duplicates or clones.

DivvyHQ (through Machinalis)
January 2014 – August 2017: Fullstack Python Developer
Python 2, Django Tastypie, Postgresql, BackboneJS, MarionetteJS, Celery, Ansible, Jenkins, Github, Sass, Bootstrap, ES6, Jira.

Kansas City startup (divvyhq.com) which builds a SPA platform to help marketing teams organize their campaigns and coordinate their content creation workflows.

• Create django forms, views, models and data migrations, create API endpoints using Tastypie.
• Refactored mocks and unit tests into integration tests.
• Refactored and denormalized several models into a Postgresql’s table view that paid off lots of technical debt.
• Designed the frontend architecture of the MarionetteJS SPA, to use controllers and dummy views and integration tests for views.
• Debugged memory leaks from BackboneJS views.
• In 2016, I relocated in Kansas City MO, USA for 6 months for a knowledge transfer programme, working from the client’s offices.
…
see more

positions.title: Python/PHP programmer / Linux sysadmin
positions.description:
June 2013 – November 2013: Fullstack Django Developer / Sysadmin
Django, Python, Jquery, PHP, Nginx, MySQL, Linux.

Infoxel (infoxel.com) records multiple TV channels to extract ad clips (using manual and automatic detection) for audition and analysis purposes.
• Developed and maintained the web platform used for manually cliping ads.
• Maintained the Linux servers infraestructure (recording and detection pipeline) up and running, automated mainenance scripts and alerts with python and cron jobs.
